story_08_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, from the look of you, I bet you’ve come
looking for a badge, haven’t you?
story_08_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The name’s Pryce. I’m a Gym Leader from
Mahogany Town and a PML Leader. If you’re
looking for a battle, I’ll take you on.
story_08_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
This old guy doesn’t waste any time!
Let’s get to it!
story_08_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Leave this one to me! I know Torkoal can
really put in work here!
story_08_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Don’t push yourself so hard, Flannery.
I can handle this old guy.
story_08_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’m f-fine. Just because I’m cold doesn’t mean
I can’t b-battle!
story_08_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Trust me! Leave this one to me—the Gym Leader
of Lavaridge Town!
story_08_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
What was that all about?
You don’t have to get all high and mighty.
story_08_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
What’s wrong? If you don’t want to battle,
I’ll be on my way.
story_08_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hold on! We’re ready to do this right now!
story_08_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Barry, Flannery—would you two calm down?
You’re being rude to our opponent.
story_08_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Have you made up your minds?
story_08_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Well then, I will show you the true harshness of
winter. Come at me with everything you’ve got!
